java.lang.Object

public class IPojoTask
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task

iPOJO Ant Task. This Ant task manipulates an input bundle.

Author:
Felix Project Team

m_ignoreAnnotations

private boolean m_ignoreAnnotations
Flag describing if we need to ignore annotation of not.

m_ignoreLocalXSD

private boolean m_ignoreLocalXSD
Flag describing if we need or not use local XSD files (i.e. use the SchemaResolver or not). If true the local XSD are not used.
